entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:57 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilot Mound 04:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -29.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -32.2°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
